main event: A single unidentified object was observed by ground personnel at Langley Air Force Base in Virginia on October 8, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as pencil-shaped, about the size of a grapefruit, with a dull red-yellow color.
The object appeared to be emitting a strong flickering light that cast a shadow on the observer.
The object made a straight-line descending flight and disappeared instantly, as if entering a bank of clouds or having its light extinguished.
The sighting lasted for 3 to 5 seconds.
A similar object was later reported by ground-controlled intercept (GCI) radar at a later time.
sighted object: pencil-shaped object about the size of a grapefruit, with a dull red-yellow color
witnesses: Ground Observer Corps and air police personnel
